amendment.description: To ensure that the Committee has jurisdiction over the Transportation Security Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4000 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 63. Record Vote Number: 201.

action.text: Amendment SA 4000 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10647-10654; text: CR S10647) To ensure that the Committee has jurisdiction over the Transportation Security Administration.
